categories.description: Rent, mortgage, electricity, water, gas, internet, home maintenance.
Groceries, restaurants, meal subscriptions, takeout (excluding coffee/tea).
Coffee shops, tea houses, packaged coffee/tea, brewing equipment, specialty drinks.
Gas, public transit, car payments, insurance, maintenance, ride-sharing (Uber, Lyft), parking.
Medical bills, insurance premiums, prescriptions, gym memberships, therapy, supplements.
Streaming services (Netflix, Spotify, etc.), movies, concerts, hobbies, books, video games.
Clothing, cosmetics, haircuts, household items, electronics.
Loan payments, credit card payments, retirement contributions, emergency fund, investments.
Bars, clubs, drinks, cover charges, late-night eats, nightlife-specific events.
Income taxes, property taxes, vehicle registration, tolls, fines, permits, passport fees.
Moving money between personal accounts (e.g., checking to savings, Venmo/Cash App, crypto).
Cash withdrawals from ATMs, ATM fees.
Cigarettes, pipe tobacco, cigars, snus, IQOS, vapes, e-liquids, rolling papers, lighters.
Charity donations, gifts, pet expenses, one-time purchases, unexpected costs.
